about_the_game:
Story

.Ryoma Sakamoto, the leader of the Satsuma Clan and the Choshu Clan, has set up an alliance between the two clans in order to bring them together and defeat the Shogunate.
However, in the middle of the Satcho alliance, a wormhole suddenly appears and those present are transported to “Fluffy Land!
Find the scattered greats in Fluffy Land and bring the Satcho alliance to a successful conclusion!

Game Features

A look-down type bullet-hell shooter!
Ryoma Sakamoto has the power of time stop & instant movement (not in the textbooks).
You can't avoid the bullets! When you think you can't avoid the bullets, stop time and move to a safe place!

While time is stopped, Ryoma Sakamoto's gun powers up when the cursor touches a bullet!
Absorb the energy of the bullets and launch a powerful attack!

Familiar greats appearing in the game

.Ryoma Sakamoto:
A samurai of the Tosa Clan at the end of the Tokugawa Shogunate in Japan who possessed the ability to stop time and travel at a moment's notice.
During the Satcho alliance, he is transported to “Fluffy Land”, but he still hasn't given up on the Satcho alliance.
He does not speak at all.
.

Saigo Takamori:
Leader of the Satsuma clan who can stop time.
He believes that the Choshu clan is responsible for the wormhole that appeared during the Satcho alliance.
.

Eiichi Shibusawa:
The man who recently became the 10,000 yen bill in Japan.
He was on the side of the Shogunate, but was caught in a wormhole while investigating the Satcho alliance.
.

Matthew Perry:
An American who came to Japan on a black ship.
Unrelated to the Satcho Alliance.
He is pressing “Fluffy Land” to open its doors to the Japanese.
.

short_description: Sakamoto Ryoma and his friends, who were in the midst of forming an alliance with Satcho, are suddenly transported to “Fluffy Land”! A bullet-hell shooter in which the player dives through a dense barrage of bullets by time-stopping and momentary movement.
